Class.name: EasyCSP.Converter.Converters.Split
Class.Description: Emulate the javascript/PHP array split/explode function with an added feature for dealing with HTTP form data. To group items as the array key only, set <var>splitOnEquals</var> to false (0). The default is to split var=val strings into array key => value pairs.
